content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hello Ms. Müller, I'm glad you liked the apartment. Let's start with a high price, shall we? I'm asking for 2000 Euro per month. Remember, I'm not interested in discussing anything other than the rent.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That is too high for me. I can offer you 1500 Euro per month.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I'm afraid 1500 Euro is too low for me. Let's meet somewhere in the middle, shall we? How about 1750 Euro? Remember, this is just for the rent. No additional costs or responsibilities discussed yet.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That sounds more reasonable. I accept your offer of 1750 Euro per month.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I agree to the price of [1750] Euro! Remember, this is solely for the rent. We haven't discussed any additional costs or responsibilities yet. If you're happy with this price, please feel free to continue renting the apartment. If not, please make a new offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I accept your offer. The price of 1750 Euro per month is fine with me. TERMINATE
name: Emilia Müller from Germany
